detaileddescription.para: This routine adds a new adapted class to an existing set of adapted templates.

parameterdescription.para: set of templates to add new class to
new class to add to templates
class id to associate with new class

detaileddescription.para: This routine frees all memory consumed by a temporary configuration.
This operation allocates and initializes a new adapted class data structure and returns a ptr to it.

simplesect.para: Ptr to new class data structure.

detaileddescription.para: This routine allocates and returns a new temporary config.

parameterdescription.para: max id of any proto in new config

detaileddescription.para: This routine allocates and returns a new temporary proto.
Read an adapted class description from File and return a ptr to the adapted class.

parameterdescription.para: open file to read adapted class from

detaileddescription.para: Read a permanent configuration description from File and return a ptr to it.

parameterdescription.para: open file to read permanent config from

simplesect.para: Ptr to new permanent configuration description.

detaileddescription.para: Read a temporary configuration description from File and return a ptr to it.

parameterdescription.para: open file to read temporary config from

simplesect.para: Ptr to new temporary configuration description.

detaileddescription.para: This routine writes a binary representation of Class to File.

parameterdescription.para: open file to write Class to
adapted class to write to File

detaileddescription.para: This routine writes a binary representation of a permanent configuration to File.

parameterdescription.para: open file to write Config to
permanent config to write to File

detaileddescription.para: This routine writes a binary representation of a temporary configuration to File.

parameterdescription.para: open file to write Config to
temporary config to write to File
